ref.mixed-citation: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change [IPCC] (2018). Summary for policymakers In Masson‐DelmotteV., ZhaiP., PörtneriH. O., RobertsD., SkeaJ., ShuklaP. R.,… WaterfieldT.
